response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its true worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
